activities: Personal information gathered through the means listed on the nabitablet.com privacy policy may be used to allow users to search for a product, place an order through Fuhu or one of its third party affiliates, process e-commerce transactions, communicate with users, such as regarding products, services and terms of service offered by Fuhu, participate in contests or questionnaires, participate in discussion boards, message boards, chat, or other community features, rate products or provide product reviews.
